page.title: 06WEBSCOTT FARM.MYDDLE
page.content: {Webscott Farm }has got 130 cows and 2 bulls ,one is{Friesian,}the other is a {Hereford }and all the cows are { {Friesian. } There are 120 beef cattle ({heifer and {bullock}) .All the {heifers}go down to {Church Stretton }for about two years then they come back again when they are due to calve.The cows have {silage }in the winter either straight out of the {silage pit }on the self feeder where they go up to a fence and eat it out of the pit or they have it from a {feeder. There are three men and the owner of the farm to work at {Webscott farm } and one of them is the herdsman.All of the men at {Webscott farm }are in their 30's or younger.The {Friesian } bull at {Webscott }really belongs to {Alford}farm.
